title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Vegetable Seeds) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (vegetable seeds) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Vegetable Seeds) Regulations 2001 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Vegetable Seeds) Regulations 2001 (S.I. 
No. 306 of 2001) are amended by substituting in Regulation 2(1) for the 
definition of “Directive” (as amended by the European Communities (Vegetable 
Seeds) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 202 of 2020)) the 
following: 
“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2002/55/EC of 13 June 20022, Council 
Directive 2003/61/EC of 18 June 20033, Regulation (EC) No 1829/2003 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 22 September 20034, Council 
Directive 2004/117/EC of 22 December 20045, Commission Directive 
2016/124/EC of 5 December 20066, Commission Directive 2009/74/EC of 26 
June 20097, Commission Implementing Directive 2013/45/EU of 7 August 
20138, Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2016/317 of 3 March 20169, 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/432 of 23 March 2020, 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 2020 and 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2024/3010 of 29th November 2024 
;”.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2024/3010 by amending the Annexes I and II to Directive 
2002/55/EC as they relate to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine 
pests (RNQPs) and measures intended to prevent their presence on vegetable 
seeds for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [141] 5
